title: DE Shaw | SDET
content:
Education: B.Tech EEE

Years of Experience: NA

Eligibility criteria: No backlogs
CGPA>=7 (for CSE)
CGPA>=8 (for ECE and EE)

For fresh grad, any related Internship/coop experience? NA

Date of the Offer: 15 Dec 2023

Company:  DE Shaw

Title/Level: SDET

Location: Bengaluru/Gurugram/Hyderabad

Salary: 18 L base

Relocation/Signing Bonus: 3L joining bonus + 1.25L relocation (on actuals)

Stock bonus: 20L over 4 yrs (5L each yr, completely cash)

Bonus: 4L-6L (based on performance)

Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): (18+3+5+6) = 32 L

Benefits: Insurance, free food, etc

Other details: No Bond
